choose.when: insert into qna(qna_seqno, qna_content, mem_id, pro_seqno) values (qna_seqno.nextval, #{qnaContent}, #{memId}, #{seqno})
choose.otherwise: update qna set qna_content = #{qnaContent} where qna_seqno = #{qnaSeqno}

mapper.select: select q.qna_seqno as qnaSeqno, q.qna_content as qnaContent from qna q where q.qna_seqno = #{seqno}

choose.when: insert into review(review_seqno, review_content, mem_id, pro_seqno) values (review_seqno.nextval, #{reviewContent}, #{memId}, #{seqno})
choose.otherwise: update review set review_content = #{reviewContent} where review_seqno = #{reviewSeqno}

mapper.select: select r.review_seqno as reviewSeqno, r.review_content as reviewContent from review r where r.review_seqno = #{reviewSeqno}
